Uses of Class
model.updatestrategy.AUpdateStrategy

  • Packages that use AUpdateStrategy 
    Package Description
    model.updatestrategy  

    • Uses of AUpdateStrategy in model.updatestrategy

      Subclasses of AUpdateStrategy in model.updatestrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BreathingUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
      breathing strategy: ball sinusoidally changes radius.
      class  CollideUpdateStrategy
      Elastic collision behavior.
      class  ColorUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
      color strategy: ball changing color every movement.
      class  CurveUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
      the curve moving strategy.
      class  DrunkenUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
      drunken strategy: balls change direction in every movement.
      class  FlashUpdateStrategy
      When two balls overlap, both of which will flash while overlapping.
      class  InfectUpdateStrategy
      When two balls overlap, make the other ball also an infect ball.
      class  MultiUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
      Multiple strategies: enables dynamically combined strategies.
      class  OverlapUpdateStrategy
      Detects whether two balls overlap.
      class  SimilarColorUpdateStrategy
      Detects whether two balls have similar colors and overlap.
      class  SpawnUpdateStrategy
      Spawn new balls when the ball contacts another one.
      class  StayAwayUpdateStrategy
      Detect if two balls are less than 20 distance away.
      class  StraightUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
      straight moving strategy.
      class  SwitcherUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
      switcher strategy class: able to update strategy after ball generated.
      class  WanderUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
      wander strategy: ball randomly go forward or backward.
